items.sentence: Tom didn\'t want to go, but his father made him go.
Tom doesn\'t have any idea how much Mary loves him.
Tom doesn\'t like it when Mary cracks her knuckles.
I just opened the door a little to let in some air.
Tom goes to the barber less than four times a year.
Tom got addicted to painkillers after his accident.
Tom got injured while trying to break up the fight.
Tom had a crush on Mary when he was in high school.
Tom doesn\'t have a good French-English dictionary.
Why didn\'t you tell me you didn\'t like chocolate?
Tom will try to convince Mary to accept your offer.
I want Tom to invite Mary and John over for dinner.
I want the name of everyone who was here yesterday.

You\'d better go to see your family doctor at once.
Tom said he regretted not following Mary\'s advice.
Generally speaking, boys like girls with long hair.
Have you ever helped your mother clean the kitchen?
How do you know this machine is really safe to use?
Do you think that Tom has enough money to buy that?
